price: i drugi, koji niste bili u stanju uzeti – Allah vam ga je dao, jer Allah sve može.
arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهَا قَدۡ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ukh'rā lam taqdirū ʿalayhā qad aḥāṭa al-lahu bihā wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīran
